info.title: Loyallyst Admin API
info.description: Comprehensive administration API for Loyallyst: manage projects, loyalty clients & groups, POS operations, integrations (Syrve, Poster), file uploads, and AI-powered query generation.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Endpoints for admin authentication, JWT login/refresh and user validation

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: CRUD operations for managing projects within an organization

tags.name: Clients
tags.description: Manage loyalty clients: list, create, update, delete, perform actions

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: Manage loyalty groups: list, create, update, delete, perform actions

tags.name: Reviews
tags.description: Manage customer reviews: list, retrieve, perform actions

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: POS transaction operations and analytics (counts, timeseries)

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Manage POS locations: list, retrieve, create, update, delete, actions

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Manage POS products: list, retrieve, create, update, delete, actions

tags.name: Product Categories
tags.description: Manage product categories for POS products

tags.name: Product Modifications
tags.description: Manage product modification options for POS

tags.name: Locations Products
tags.description: Manage assignment of products to specific locations

tags.name: Tables
tags.description: Manage POS table entities: list, create, update, delete, actions

tags.name: Uploads
tags.description: File upload handling: list, retrieve, upload, delete

tags.name: Ollama
tags.description: Generate OData queries from natural language via Ollama AI

tags.name: OpenAI
tags.description: Generate OData filter strings from natural language via OpenAI

servers.description: Production endpoint for the admin API

email.description: Administrator email address used for authentication.

organizationName.description: Name of the organization to be created.

organization.description: Organization entity the admin is associated with.

LoyaltyGroupType.description: Type of loyalty group (BONUS or DISCOUNT).

organization.description: Organization under which this project is created.

type.description: Type of loyalty group (BONUS or DISCOUNT).

value.description: Numeric value for the group (points threshold or discount percentage).

externalId.description: External system identifier for this loyalty group.

project.description: Project owning this loyalty group.

organization.description: Organization under which this loyalty group is created.

defaultGroup.description: Default loyalty group for the project (nullable).

project.description: Project entity owning this loyalty configuration.

organization.description: Organization entity associated with this configuration.

defaultGroupId.description: UUID of the default loyalty group to assign for this project.

loyalty.description: Nested object containing loyalty-related update fields.

name.description: Original name of the uploaded file.

mimeType.description: MIME type of the uploaded file.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

url.description: URL where the file can be accessed.

width.description: Image width in pixels, if the file is an image.

height.description: Image height in pixels, if the file is an image.

organization.description: Organization under which this file was uploaded.

enabled.description: Whether delivery is enabled for this zone.

location.description: Reference to the Location entity for this zone.

project.description: Reference to the Project entity.

organization.description: Reference to the Organization entity.

address.description: Physical street address of the location.

city.description: City where the location is situated.

phone.description: Contact phone number for the location.

image.description: Optional image associated with the location.

externalId.description: External system identifier for the location.

products.description: List of products available at this location.

zones.description: List of zones available at this location.

project.description: Project under which this location is created.

organization.description: Organization that owns this location.

order.description: Sort order of the category (lower values appear first).

mondayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during monday.

tuesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during tuesday.

wednesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during wednesday.

thursdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during thursday.

fridayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during friday.

saturdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during saturday.

sundayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during sunday.

products.description: List of products under this category.

externalId.description: External system identifier for this category.

project.description: Project entity owning this category.

organization.description: Organization entity owning this category.

externalId.description: External system ID for this option.

image.description: Image file associated with this option.

project.description: Project entity owning this option.

organization.description: Organization entity under which this option is created.

name.description: Name of the modification group (e.g., Toppings, Sizes).

externalId.description: External system ID for the modification group.

min.description: Minimum number of options required from this group.

max.description: Maximum number of options allowed from this group.

options.description: Array of option entities available under this modification.

project.description: Project entity reference for scoping this modification.

organization.description: Organization entity reference for this modification group.

description.example: A rich and creamy espresso-based drink with steamed milk.

weight.description: Weight of the product in grams.

order.description: Sort order of the product (lower values appear first).

externalId.description: External system identifier for the product.

category.description: Category entity reference for this product.

modifications.description: Array of modification entities applicable to this product.

image.description: Image file entity associated with this product.

project.description: Project entity reference for scoping this product.

organization.description: Organization entity reference for this product.

enabled.description: Whether the product is available at this location.

price.description: Price of the product at this location.

project.description: Project entity reference.

organization.description: Organization entity reference.

city.description: City where the location is situated.

phone.description: Phone number of the location in E.164 or local format.

imageId.description: Reference ID to an image for this location.

projectId.description: Unique identifier of the project this location belongs to.

enabled.description: Whether delivery is enabled for this zone.

address.description: Updated physical address of the location.

city.description: Updated city where the location is situated.

phone.description: Updated phone number of the location.

imageId.description: Updated reference ID to an image for this location.

zones.description: List of zones associated with this location.

order.description: Display order of the category (lower numbers appear first).

mondayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during monday.

tuesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during tuesday.

wednesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during wednesday.

thursdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during thursday.

fridayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during friday.

saturdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during saturday.

sundayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during sunday.

projectId.description: Project identifier under which this category is created.

name.description: Updated name of the product category.

mondayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during monday.

tuesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during tuesday.

wednesdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during wednesday.

thursdayAvailability.description: Availability of this category during thursday.
